title: By the King, a proclamation for the discovery and apprehending all popish priests and Jesuits
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twentieth day of November, 1678, in the thirtieth year of our reign."
Imperfect: faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
